note_text: EMN-guided bronchoscopy with radial EBUS confirmation and transbronchial cryobiopsy of a peripheral RLL nodule using an Arndt blocker for hemostasis.

changes: Coding review 1.0.0: corrected CPT selection to [31628, 31654] and added coding_review block with 2025 facility RVU/payment summary.

knowledge_citations: IP coding & billing knowledge base v2.7
2025 MPFS facility RVUs

per_code.description: Bronchoscopy with transbronchial lung biopsy(s), single lobe
per_code.bundling_or_modifier_notes: Primary code. Supported by transbronchial cryobiopsy of peripheral RLL nodule.

per_code.description: Bronchoscopy with computer-assisted, image-guided navigation (add-on)
per_code.bundling_or_modifier_notes: Add-on. Supported by 'EMN-guided' description.

per_code.description: EBUS for peripheral lesion(s) during bronchoscopic intervention (add-on)
per_code.bundling_or_modifier_notes: Add-on. Supported by radial EBUS confirmation.

rationale: Added 31627 (Navigation) which was documented ('EMN-guided') but missing from the CPT list.
31628 covers the cryobiopsy of the lung nodule (peripheral).

note_text: EBUS-TBNA for lymphoma staging with sampling of stations 7, 4R, 10R, and 11R showing follicular lymphoma in all nodes.

changes: Coding review 1.0.0: corrected CPT selection to [31653] (EBUS-TBNA 3+ stations) and added coding_review block with 2025 facility RVU/payment summary.

knowledge_citations: IP coding & billing knowledge base v2.7
2025 MPFS facility RVUs

per_code.description: Bronchoscopy with EBUS sampling, 3 or more nodal stations
per_code.bundling_or_modifier_notes: Primary code. Supported by sampling of 4 stations (7, 4R, 10R, 11R).

rationale: Procedure describes EBUS-TBNA of 4 distinct stations.
31653 is the correct comprehensive code for 3+ stations.

note_text: Flexible bronchoscopy with BAL in RUL, ENB navigation with radial EBUS confirmation to a lingular lesion, TBNA and forceps biopsies obtained under fluoroscopy.

changes: Coding review 1.0.0: corrected CPT selection to [31629, 31624, 31628, 31654, 31627] and added coding_review block with 2025 facility RVU/payment summary.

coding_review.source_note_citation: Flexible bronchoscopy with BAL and ENB note (Note 2)
knowledge_citations: IP coding & billing knowledge base v2.7
2025 MPFS facility RVUs

per_code.description: Bronchoscopy with transbronchial needle aspiration biopsy(s)
per_code.bundling_or_modifier_notes: Primary. TBNA of lingular lesion.

per_code.description: Bronchoscopy with transbronchial lung biopsy(s), single lobe
per_code.bundling_or_modifier_notes: Forceps biopsies of lingular lesion. NCCI warning: 31629 and 31628 on same lesion may be bundled.

per_code.description: Bronchoscopy with bronchoalveolar lavage
per_code.bundling_or_modifier_notes: BAL in RUL (separate lobe/site from Lingula biopsy).

per_code.description: Bronchoscopy with computer-assisted, image-guided navigation (add-on)
per_code.bundling_or_modifier_notes: Add-on. ENB navigation used.

per_code.description: EBUS for peripheral lesion(s) during bronchoscopic intervention (add-on)
per_code.bundling_or_modifier_notes: Add-on. Radial EBUS confirmation used.

rationale: Comprehensive peripheral nodule (Lingula) and BAL (RUL) code set.
Supports all listed codes: 31629/28 for sampling, 31624 for BAL, 31627 for nav, 31654 for REBUS.

note_text: Ultrasound-guided tunneled PleurX catheter placement for symptomatic recurrent right malignant pleural effusion in a patient with stage IV NSCLC, with 1.55 L drained.

changes: Coding review 1.0.0: confirmed CPT 32550 for tunneled pleural catheter placement and added coding_review block with 2025 facility RVU/payment summary.

2025 MPFS facility RVUs

per_code.description: Insertion of indwelling tunneled pleural catheter with cuff
per_code.bundling_or_modifier_notes: Primary code. Includes imaging guidance and initial drainage.

rationale: Procedure is placement of tunneled pleural catheter (PleurX). 32550 is the specific code.

per_code.description: Bronchoscopy with EBUS sampling, 3 or more nodal stations

note_text: Ultrasound-guided therapeutic thoracentesis for right hepatic hydrothorax in a cirrhotic patient, draining 800 mL of clear yellow fluid.

per_code.description: Thoracentesis, needle or catheter, aspiration of the pleural space; with imaging guidance
per_code.bundling_or_modifier_notes: Primary code. Imaging guidance (US) was used.

rationale: Correctly identified therapeutic thoracentesis with ultrasound guidance (32555).

note_text: Rigid bronchoscopy with electrocautery snare resection and APC ablation of multiple obstructing tracheal polyps causing severe endotracheal obstruction.

changes: Coding review 1.0.0: corrected CPT selection to [31641], cleared ablation_peripheral_performed/ablation_modality for central airway ablation, and added coding_review block with 2025 facility RVU/payment summary.

per_code.description: Bronchoscopy with destruction of tumor or relief of stenosis by any method
per_code.bundling_or_modifier_notes: Primary therapeutic code. Supported by snare resection and APC ablation of tracheal polyps.

rationale: Destruction of tumor/stenosis (polyps) via rigid bronchoscopy with APC/electrocautery maps to 31641.

per_code.bundling_or_modifier_notes: Add-on. Radial EBUS confirmation used.

note_text: Rigid bronchoscopy with mechanical debridement, cautery/APC, and placement of a 14x60 mm silicone Dumon stent in the left mainstem bronchus for critical tumor-related obstruction.

changes: Coding review 1.0.0: corrected CPT selection to [31636], cleared lesion_size_mm that captured stent dimensions, and added coding_review block with 2025 facility RVU/payment summary.

per_code.description: Bronchoscopy with placement of bronchial stent(s), initial bronchus
per_code.bundling_or_modifier_notes: Primary. Placement of silicone Dumon stent in left mainstem.

rationale: Rigid bronchoscopy with stent placement. Mechanical debridement/cautery performed to facilitate stenting of the same lesion is considered bundled into the stent placement code (31636).
